com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.render

Class DwDebugDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • DebugDraw
      • com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.render.DwDebugDraw

  • public class DwDebugDraw
extends DebugDraw
    Box2D debug draw, utilizing processings basic draw calls.
    Very useful to test things, but not optimized for performance.
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald
